properties.Name of the Torrent/ Stream/ Canal: Torrent flow across the Samurdhi road
properties.Current status: Soil erosion of lands on both sides.
properties.Description:
Construction of leader drain across streams -1m(W)x1m(H)
Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows, Beetle creeper VP @ 3m spacing in a single row, green gram as a cover crop including applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer and maintenance

Vegetative cover improving, replanting bamboo species and vetiver grass or riparian species at 500mm grid interval including applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer and maintenance
Boulder /Rubble dams (SABO) across streams to trap sediment-Size 3m(L)x2m(W)x1m(H)
Vegetative cover improving with Areca nut seedling @ 1.5m spacing in a single row, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedling sand dense planting at 500mm grid interval, applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer, mulching with straw/ banana tree skin and maintenance
